data.title: ‘Longlegs,’ ‘Thelma’ and Indie Film’s New Formula for Success
data.meta_description: The decline of the independent film business has been a major concern among Hollywood producers and executives in recent years.
data.text:
The decline of the independent film business has been a major concern among Hollywood producers and executives in recent years.

We are just two and a half months away from this year’s Screentime conference, so I will start providing regular updates on programming. We just added a trio of speakers to our lineup:
